title: Support object unloading in JIT
body_html:
At the moment, we only ever dlopen .so files, which means that a process that continually uses the JIT will eventually OOM, since this is never GCed. Make this not be the case.

I know GHCi linker supports unloading, so it will just take some legwork.
body_text:
At the moment, we only ever dlopen .so files, which means that a process that continually uses the JIT will eventually OOM, since this is never GCed. Make this not be the case.
I know GHCi linker supports unloading, so it will just take some legwork.
body:
At the moment, we only ever dlopen `.so` files, which means that a process that continually uses the JIT will eventually OOM, since this is never GCed. Make this not be the case.

I know GHCi linker supports unloading, so it will just take some legwork.
